name: Team 12 - Dragon no nakama
description:
Have you ever dreamed of being a ninja and riding a dragon?
Dragon no nakama is what you are looking for.
Play as a ninja who must survive as long as possible on top of a crazy dragon in this 2D endless runner, but watch out for obstacles!

Move on the dragon's body to dodge all the obstacles that will appear on the way
Learn and master the different patterns while collecting coins and gold Neko to increase your score

Game Programmer

Luca SCHIFANO
Léo TOMPKIN
Chloé MATHIAS

Game Designer

Maxime SOUPRE
Simon DIALINAS
Mathieu MELEK

Game Artist

Game Producer
